General.Name: Navstone SE
General.Description: Navstone SE is a public investment firm specializing in direct investments in restructuring of non-listed, medium sized firms that are facing special situations. The firm focuses on the acquisition of majority holdings in privately-owned and small and medium-sized firms. Within special situations, the firm seeks to invest in unresolved business successions, turnarounds, restructuring, reorganizations of firms near insolvency, unsolved company's transmissions, management buy outs, management buy-ins and corporate spin-offs. It typically invests in all sectors. The firm targets the European region. The firm invests up to "5 million ($6.63 million) in equity. It typically takes up to a 100 percent stake. The firm also provides investment banking and consultancy services through its subsidiaries. The company was formerly known as Navigator Equity Solutions SE. Navstone SE was founded in 2004 and is headquartered in Eindhoven, Netherlands with an additional office in Munich, Germany.
General.Address: Laan van Diepenvoorde 3, Waalre, Netherlands, 5582 LA
